medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute epigastric abdominal pain with radiation to the back and associated nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms developed acutely yesterday, following an ERCP performed 2 days prior for CBD dilation. The patient experienced pain that started after an unsuccessful cannulation of the bile duct and placement of a pancreatic stent, which was meant to assist but was also unsuccessful. The pain was intense and radiated to the back.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of cholecystectomy, hernia, lupus with arthritis, exercise-induced asthma, hypertension.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of multiple sclerosis and scleroderma.
